description: This file defines the 'Note' class for a Flutter/Dart application, representing a note object with properties such as id, title, content, category, createdAt, and updatedAt. It includes methods for copying, serialization, and deserialization, and appears to be a core model within a note-taking app.

classes.name: Note
classes.description: A model class representing a note with various properties and utility methods for copying, mapping, and string representation.

methods.name: copyWith
methods.description: Creates a copy of the Note object with optional new values for its fields.

methods.name: toMap
methods.description: Serializes the Note object into a Map for storage or transfer.

methods.name: fromMap
methods.description: Creates a Note object from a Map, typically used for deserialization.
